mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNGNRLMBER ( ESNTL_ID , MBER_ID , MBER_NM , PASSWORD , PASSWORD_HINT , PASSWORD_CNSR , IHIDNUM , SEXDSTN_CODE , ZIP , ADRES , AREA_NO , MBER_STTUS , DETAIL_ADRES , END_TELNO , MBTLNUM , GROUP_ID , MBER_FXNUM , MBER_EMAIL_ADRES , MIDDLE_TELNO , SBSCRB_DE ) VALUES( #{uniqId}, #{mberId}, #{mberNm}, #{password}, #{passwordHint}, #{passwordCnsr}, #{ihidnum}, #{sexdstnCode}, #{zip}, #{adres}, #{areaNo}, #{mberSttus}, #{detailAdres}, #{endTelno}, #{moblphonNo}, #{groupId}, #{mberFxnum}, #{mberEmailAdres}, #{middleTelno}, sysdate() )
